contentList.content: You are an instrument of retribution against those who dare defy the laws of the divine, a crusader judging and punishing the wicked.
Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that damages an enemy from a distance for an additional [1].
Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing your weapon's damage plus [1] to all nearby enemies.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, giving you bonus Radiant damage and healing equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> and reducing the number you need to roll a critical hit by 1.

You deal an additional <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">[1]</LSTag>, restore an additional <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">[2]</LSTag> health, and the number you need to roll a critical hit is reduced by 1.

When you land a Critical Hit on a creature, your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TemplarsVerdict">Templar's Verdict</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DivineStorm">Divine Storm</LSTag> will not cost a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charge.

Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TemplarsVerdict">Templar's Verdict</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DivineStorm">Divine Storm</LSTag> will not cost a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charge.
